mapper.insert: INSERT INTO house (house_id, house_name, user_id, house_prices, house_sell, house_address, house_size, house_desc) VALUES (#{house_id}, #{house_name}, #{user_id}, #{house_prices}, #{house_sell}, #{house_address}, #{house_size}, #{house_desc})
mapper.update: UPDATE house SET house_name = #{house_name}, user_id = #{user_id}, house_prices = #{house_prices}, house_sell = #{house_sell}, house_address = #{house_address}, house_size = #{house_size}, house_desc = #{house_desc} WHERE house_id = #{house_id}
